类 SongSelectionButtons

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.menu.songselection.SongSelectionButtons
所有已实现的接口:
Focusable, Scalable
public class SongSelectionButtons extends Object implements Scalable, Focusable
The SongSelectionButtons class manages the creation and rendering of buttons for selecting songs and their difficulty levels in the song selection menu. It provides functionality for navigating between levels and moving up or down within the selection menu.

This class supports scaling of button sizes and setting their focus, allowing for interaction with the user interface. It also handles the rendering of different song levels (BS, MD, AV, LG) and provides visual feedback when buttons are selected or focused.

    • renderLevels

      public void renderLevels(Graphics2D g2d, Song s)
      Renders all level buttons for a given song.
      参数:
      g2d - the graphics object used for rendering.
      s - the Song object associated with the song selection.

    • setFocused

      public void setFocused(MouseEvent e)
      Sets the focus for each of the song selection buttons based on the provided mouse event. This method updates the focused state of the level buttons and navigation buttons when the user interacts with them.
      指定者:
      setFocused 在接口中 Focusable
      参数:
      e - the MouseEvent representing the user's mouse interaction, used to determine which button is focused.
